Title: Authorizes the public service commission to consider non-economic loss suffered by consumers when determining penalties
Summary: Authorizes the public service commission to consider non-economic loss suffered by consumers, including pain and suffering or mental anguish, when determining penalties against a public utility company, corporation or person or a combination gas and electric corporation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to authorizing consideration of non-economic loss suffered by consumers when determining penalties
